column1: Though we face unprecedented times there is much to be immensely grateful for this #Thanksgiving. Heidi & I are wishing everyone a Happy Thanksgiving. May God bless you and your families and may God continue to bless the United States of America. https://t.co/VEDEV5lyxK

.@realDonaldTrump’s pardon for @GenFlynn was the right thing to do. The Obama-Biden administration weaponized the @TheJusticeDept FBI & intel community to destroy their political opponents. It was abusive it was lawless and it was political persecution.

Enjoyed speaking with members of the @cambridgeunion a student organization that has a tremendous tradition of passionate engagement on issues of the day.  My advice to them was simple: keep engaging in the battle of ideas because ideas have the potential to change the world. https://t.co/4Nkd6MHwBl

I applaud the @usairforce for selecting Joint Reserve Base Fort Worth to receive the new C-130J aircraft which will replace eight older C-130H aircraft. This excellent news serves as yet another acknowledgement of the tremendous value that Texas offers to our nation’s defense.

This week Americans will celebrate the dearly won gift of freedom & those we are blessed to share it with. As many families grapple with the challenges posed by #COVID19 this #Thanksgiving let us also reflect on the resiliency of the American spirit.

Pleased the Trump administration has taken the final & necessary step to formally withdraw from the Open Skies Treaty. I've been proud to lead the fight in the Senate to help deliver this blow to Putin’s espionage operations & to counter efforts that weaken our national security.
